trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe usada para configurar como o serviço autentica os usuários que usam a autenticação de senha/nome de usuário e configurar o cache de tokens de logon.

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma das associações usadas por um serviço estiver configurada para autenticação baseada em nome/senha do usuário, as propriedades relevantes para esta classe são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades incluem o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma das associações usadas por um serviço estiver configurada para usar autenticação do Windows para o nome de usuário/senha, as configurações relacionadas ao cache de tokens de logon são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: These settings include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Essas configurações incluem o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The following example prints the values of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential> properties for a service.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir imprime os valores de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential> propriedades para um serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tempo máximo que um token pode ficar armazenado em cache.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que representa o comprimento máximo de tempo que um token é armazenado em cache.

trans-unit.source: The default is 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 15 minutos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os tokens de logon são armazenados em cache.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os tokens de logon são armazenadas em cache; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, WCF security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, a segurança do WCF solicita o subsistema de segurança do Windows para criar um token de logon para cada token de segurança de nome e senha do usuário, se o nome de usuário está sendo mapeado para uma conta do Windows.

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento pode ser alterado definindo a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Windows> mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Windows> modo, o serviço usa do Win32 `LogonUser` função para autenticação de senha/nome de usuário.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> é definido como `true`, o token do Windows resultante é armazenado em cache e reutilizado para o mesmo par de nome e senha do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The cache is valid for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O cache é válido para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of caches is limited to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de caches é limitado a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um validador personalizado de nome de usuário e senha.

trans-unit.source: A custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: Um validador de nome e senha de usuário personalizada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider> para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> entrem em vigor.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, WCF uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> está definida e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> não é de propriedade, WCF usa a autenticação do Windows e ignora o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Custom> mode, the service uses <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Custom> modo, o serviço usa <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> para autenticação de nome e senha do usuário chamando o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os grupos do Windows são incluídos no contexto de segurança.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se grupos do Windows são incluídos no contexto de segurança; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos cenários ao validar nomes de usuário do Windows e senhas, grupos do Windows na qual os usuários pertencem fornecem informações úteis para decisões de autorização.

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se os grupos do Windows não são necessários, a definição dessa propriedade `false` pode melhorar o desempenho, evitando uma população de declaração de grupo completo.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de tokens de logon a serem armazenados em cache.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de tokens de logon para o cache.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 128.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 128.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o valor dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o provedor de associação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> for this service.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider" /> para este serviço.

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider> mode, the service uses <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider> modo, o serviço usa <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> para autenticação de nome e senha do usuário chamando o <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider> para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> entrem em vigor.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, WCF uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> está definida e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> não é de propriedade, WCF usa a autenticação do Windows e ignora o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> está definida como `MembershipProvider` e `MembershipProvider` propriedade não está definida para um valor, o padrão é o <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> classe.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa de definir essa propriedade quando a credencial é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o método de validação do nome de usuário e senha.

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration in <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da enumeração em <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode" />.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are:
trans-unit.target: Os possíveis valores são:

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Custom>, the service uses the object returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade é definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Custom>, o serviço usa o objeto retornado por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> para validar nomes de usuário e senhas em mensagens de entrada.

trans-unit.source: When a WCF service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Custom>, the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: Quando um serviço WCF é hospedado no Internet Information Services (IIS) usando a segurança de nível de transporte e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> está definida como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.Custom>, o esquema de autenticação personalizado usa um subconjunto da autenticação do Windows.

trans-unit.source: That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to WCF invoking the custom authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque, nesse cenário, o IIS executa autenticação do Windows antes de invocar o autenticador personalizado de WCF.

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider>, specify the membership provider by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor dessa propriedade é definido como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode.MembershipProvider>, especifique o provedor de associação, definindo o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> propriedade e, em seguida, a instância do provedor de associação especificado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> propriedade é usada para validar o nome de usuário e a senha em mensagens de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir obtém o valor dessa propriedade.
